original: veti evaṁ tarhi jñāpayatyācāryo bhavatyeṣā paribhāṣā vyākhyānata ityādi ||

original: yāvatā karmaṇi ca ityanena pratiṣedhena bhāvyam |

original: na ca kṛdyogalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī samasyata ityanena samāsaḥ śakyate karttum |

original: karmaṇi cetyanenobhayaprāptau karmaṇi ityanena niyamena yā ṣaṣṭhī tasyā eva samāsapratiṣedho vijñāyate |

original: atra cārthe karttari ca iti sūtraṁ pramāṇam |
analyzed: atra ca arthe karttari ca iti sūtra pramāṇam

analyzed: anyathā sraṣṭā odanasya bhojakaḥ ityādau karmaṇi ca iti anena eva pratiṣedhasya siddha tvāt karttari ca iti anarthaka syāt

original: na ca praiṣyasya hārayitā praiṣyasya kārayitā ityatra hṛkroranyatarasyām iti karttari ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedhārthamidamiti |
analyzed: na ca praiṣyasya hārayitā praiṣyasya kārayitā iti atra hṛ kroḥ anyatarasyām iti karttari ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pratiṣedha artham idam iti

original: yattu tṛjakābhyāṁ karttarītyatra vṛttāvuktaṁ tṛjgrahaṇamuttarārthamiti tatkarttari ceti sūtre sthite iti |

original: ubhayaprāptāviti niyamena ca ṣaṣṭhī ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayoge ityataḥ prayogagrahaṇānuvṛtteryatra sāmarthyaprāptaṁ kartṛkarmaṇorubhayorupādānaṁ tatraiva  #
analyzed: ubhaya prāptau iti niyamena ca ṣaṣṭhī ṣaṣṭhī hetu prayoge iti atas prayoga grahaṇa anuvṛtteḥ yatra kartṛ karmaṇoḥ ubhayoḥ upādāna tatra eva
yathā syāt
yathā āścaryaḥ gavā dohaḥ gopālakena iti

original: tathā hyatrāścaryaṁ pratipādyaṁ tacca durdohānāṁ gavāṁ karmaṇāmasuśikṣitasyāgopālakasya ca karttuḥ sāmarthyaprāpte upādāne ṣaṣṭhī bhavati nānyathā
analyzed: tathā hi atra āścarya pratipādya tat ca gavā karmaṇām asuśikṣitasya a gopālakasya ca karttuḥ sāmarthya prāpte upādāne ṣaṣṭhī bhavati na anyathā

original: viśeṣapratipattirityatra tu śiṣyādeḥ karturakiṁcitkaratvānna sāmarthyaprāptaṁ kartturupādānam |
analyzed: viśeṣa pratipattiḥ iti atra tu śiṣya ādeḥ kartuḥ akicitkaratvāt na sāmarthya prāpta karttuḥ upādānam

original: evaṁ ca sati antarddhau yenādarśanamicchati ityatra yeneti tṛtīyā na yuktā kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti karttari ṣaṣṭhīvidhānāt |
analyzed: eva ca sati antarddhau yena adarśanam icchati iti atra yena iti tṛtīyā na yuktā kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛti iti karttari ṣaṣṭhī vidhānāt
ucyate
nirddeśāt eva tṛtīyā iti adoṣaḥ
anyaḥ tu ācaṣṭe

original: tathā cāntarddhau yenādarśanamicchatītyatra nyāsakṛtā ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ityatra rakṣitena ca gamyamāne'pi karmaṇi niyamātṣaṣṭhyabhāvena  #
analyzed: tathā ca antarddhau yena adarśanam icchati iti atra nyāsa kṛtā ubhaya prāptau karmaṇi iti atra rakṣitena ca gamyamāne api karmaṇi niyamāt ṣaṣṭhī abhāvena
antarddhau yena iti nirddeśa siddhiḥ uktā

original: kiṁ tvevamaiuṇityatra tasya grahaṇaṁ bhavatyekeneti tatra tasyeti karttari ṣaṣṭhīti nyāse yaduktaṁ tanna śobhanam |
analyzed: tu evam aiuṇ iti atra tasya grahaṇa bhavati ekena iti tatra tasya iti karttari ṣaṣṭhī iti nyāse yat ukta tat na śobhanam

original: tathā hyatrāpi gamyamāne grāhye karmaṇi ubhayaprāptāviti niyamātṣaṣṭyā na bhavitavyam |
analyzed: tathā hi atra api gamyamāne grāhye karmaṇi ubhaya prāptau iti niyamāt ṣaṣṭyā na bhavitavyam
etat ca śabdānuśāsane nyāsa kṛtā vyākhyātam
yat tu tatra sva mati mahima prāgalbhyāt anunyāsakāraḥ vyājahāra

original: yatra sāmarthyaprāptamubhayorupādānaṁ sa ubhayaprāptau karmaṇītyasya viṣayaḥ |
analyzed: yatra sāmarthya prāptam ubhayoḥ upādāna saḥ ubhaya prāptau karmaṇi iti asya viṣayaḥ

original: anyathā kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛtītyasya vidherubhayaprāptāvityādeśca viṣayavibhāgo na syāt |
analyzed: anyathā kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛti ityasya vidheḥ ubhayaprāptau ityādeḥ ca viṣaya vibhāgaḥ na syāt
na ca akartṛka karma asti iti nyāyāt iti
tat ayuktam

original: purāṁ bhettā devadatta ityādau abhihite kartari niyamāprasaṅgāt |
analyzed: purā bhettā devadattaḥ ityādau abhihite kartari niyama aprasaṅgāt
atra ucyate

original: ṣaṣthī hetuprayoge ityato'nuvarttamānamapi prayogagrahaṇamanaṅgīkṛtya yathā yuṣmābhirgamyamāne karmaṇi ubhayaprāptāviti niyama ucyate tathā'smābhirapyanabhihitādhikāramanaṅgīkṛtya  #
analyzed: ṣaṣthī hetu prayoge iti atas nuvarttamānam api prayoga grahaṇam an aṅgīkṛtya yathā yuṣmābhiḥ gamyamāne karmaṇi ubhaya prāptau iti niyamaḥ ucyate tathā asmābhiḥ api anabhihita adhikāram an aṅgīkṛtya
vibhāga abhāvaḥ uktaḥ
etat ca ayuktam

original: akākārayīḥ pratiṣedhoḥ vaktavya ityanyena yatra niyamo bādhyate tatra vidheḥ kṛtārthatvāt |
analyzed: vaktavyaḥ iti anyena yatra niyamaḥ bādhyate tatra vidheḥ kṛtārtha tvāt
cikīrṣā raveḥ ālokānām iti

original: tathā kāryaḥ kaṭo devadattasyetyatrābhihite karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhīprasaṅgācca |
analyzed: tathā kāryaḥ kaṭaḥ devadattasya iti atra abhihite karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī prasaṅgāt ca
ucyate

original: kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛtītyasya vidherubhayaprāptāvityādeśca vidheriti naite samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭyau kiṁ tarhi vaiyadhikaraṇye |
analyzed: kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛti ityasya vidheḥ ubhaya prāptau ityādeḥ ca vidheḥ iti na ete samāna adhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭyau ki tarhi vaiyadhikaraṇye

original: tadayamarthaḥ kartṛkarṁaṇoḥ kṛtītyasya saṁbandhī yo vidhiḥ karttari ca iti,
analyzed: tat ayam arthaḥ kartṛ karaṇoḥ kṛti ityasya sabandhī yaḥ vidhiḥ karttari ca iti

original: tathobhayaprāptau karmaṇītyasya yo vidhiḥ karmaṇi ca iti etayorviṣayavibhāgo na syādityayamabhiprāyaḥ |
analyzed: tathā ubhaya prāptau karmaṇi ityasya yaḥ vidhiḥ karmaṇi ca iti etayoḥ viṣaya vibhāgaḥ na syāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: yadi gamyamāne'pi karttari ubhayaprāptāviti karmaṇi niyamaḥ syāt tadā idhmavraścana ityādāvapi karaṇe lyuṭi karmaṇi ceti niṣedhaḥ syāt kartṛlyuṭyapi  #
analyzed: yadi gamyamāne api karttari ubhaya prāptau iti karmaṇi niyamaḥ syāt tadā idhma vraścane ityādau api karaṇe lyuṭi karmaṇi ca iti niṣedhaḥ syāt kartṛ lyuṭi api
idhma pravraścanaḥ devadattaḥ iti atra api ātmanā devadattena iti asya kartuḥ gamyamāna tvāt ubhaya prāptiḥ avyāhatā eva

original: evaṁ ca karmaṇi yā kā citṣaṣṭhī tasyā eva sarvasyāḥ karmaṇi cetyanena samāsapratiṣedhe siddhe kartari cetyanārambhaṇīyaṁ syāt |
analyzed: eva ca karmaṇi yā kā cit ṣaṣṭhī tasyāḥ eva sarvasyāḥ karmaṇi ca iti anena samāsa pratiṣedhe siddhe kartari ca iti anārambhaṇīya syāt

original: ārabdhaṁ cāto yuktamuktaṁ viṣayavibhāgo na syāditi |
analyzed: ca atas yuktam ukta viṣaya vibhāgaḥ na syāt iti
etat ca na
ātmanā ityasya karttuḥ gasyamāna tve pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: evaṁ tarhi purāmbhettā devadatta ityādau yathā kartturabhihitatvānniyamo na bhavati tathā śabdānuśāsanamityatrāpi karturaprayogāt |
analyzed: eva tarhi purām bhettā devadattaḥ ityādau yathā karttuḥ abhihita tvāt niyamaḥ na bhavati tathā śabda anuśāsanam iti atra api kartuḥ aprayogāt

original: tatra yathā karttṛṣaṣṭhīprāptyā vināpi gamyamāne karttari niyama ucyate tathābihite'pi karttari niyamamuttkā (niyamamuktā?)
analyzed: tatra yathā karttṛ ṣaṣṭhī prāptyā vinā api gamyamāne karttari niyamaḥ ucyate tathā a bihite api karttari niyama muttkā niyama muktā
viṣaya vibhāgaḥ uktaḥ
eva ca vidhi niyama vākyayoḥ eva viṣaya vibhāga abhāvaḥ
etat ca aka ākārayoḥ prayoge vidheḥ kṛtārtha tva anāśrayaṇena ucyate
na hi kāryī nimitta tvena āśīyate

original: yatkāryabhāk tatkaryaṁ prati nimittaṁ na bhavatītyarthaḥ |

original: tenādhyetā adhyāpakaḥ śayitā śāyaka ityatra iṅśīṅorṅitvāt kṅiti ca iti guṇavṛddhipratiṣedho na bhavati |

original: tadevamīdūdeddvivacanamityādau pragṛhyasaṁjñāyā vidhīyamānasya karmaṇo vidherīdūdetaḥ karaṇasya vidhānasya dvivacanasya ca kartturvidhibhājaḥ  #

original: atha vā kṛgṛsvīkāra iti bahubrīhirayaṁ kṛgroḥ svīkāro yasminniti kṛgṛsvīkāraḥ kiraśca pañcabhya iti yogastasminkṛgṛsvīkāre kiraśca pañcabhya  #

original: evaṁ ca ṛgrahaṇamanarthakaṁ tasmādiṭ sani vā ityatra ṛgrahaṇaṁ nānuvarttate vṛṅvṛñāvevānuvarttate vṛṅvṛñoreveḍvikalpaḥ ṛtāṁ tu smipūṅrañjvaśāṁ  #

original: sani ityanenaiva nityamiṭ siddha iti kṛgṛgrahaṇameva vicchedaheturiti ||

original: na cāsminvyākhyāne saptadaśa pratyayā iti vṛttigrantho'saṅgataḥ syāt |
analyzed: na ca asmin vyākhyāne saptadaśa pratyayāḥ iti vṛtti grantha usaṅgataḥ syāt

original: ghapratyayena vā saptadaśa pratyayā iti bhaviṣyati |
analyzed: gha pratyayena vā saptadaśa pratyayāḥ iti bhaviṣyati

original: atha vā pratyaya iti sūtrasādhane kāyabādhāpakṣe'ckāryaṁ lyuṭśāstreṇa bādhyate |

ca śāstra bādha pakṣe gha śāstreṇa bādhitam

original: acpravṛttau lyuṇ nāsti lyuṭśāstrasya ghaśāstreṇa prāgeva bādhitatvāt |
analyzed: a c pravṛttau lyuṭ na asti lyuṭ śāstrasya gha śāstreṇa prāk eva bādhita tvāt
eva ca na cakrakam iti

original: etasyāḥ prāmāṇaṁ vā'sarūpo'striyām ityatra vāgrahaṇasya vyavasthitavibhāṣāvijñānaṁ nyāsakāreṇoktam |
analyzed: etasyāḥ iti atra vā grahaṇasya nyāsakāreṇa uktam

original: tathā āchi āyāma ityasmālliṭi dvirvacane'bhyāsasya hrasvatve ca kṛte bhūtapūrvagatyā dvimātro'yamākāra ityata ādeḥ iti taparakaraṇāddīrgho  #
analyzed: tathā āyāmaḥ iti asmāt liṭi dvirvacana ibhyāsasya hrasva tve ca kṛte bhūta pūrva gatyā dvi mātraḥ yam ākāraḥ iti atas ādeḥ iti ta para karaṇāt dīrghaḥ

original: tathā ca āñcha āñchatuḥ āñchuriti tasmānnuḍ dvihalaḥ iti nuḍāgamo na bhavati |
analyzed: tathā ca āñchaḥ āñchatuḥ āñchuḥ iti tasmāt nuṭ dvi ha laḥ iti nuṭ āgamaḥ na bhavati

original: na caivaṁ pibateḥ sani dvirvacane'bhyāsahrasvatve ca kṛte bhūtapūrvagatyā dvimātro'yamākāra iti taparakaraṇāt pipāsatītyatrettvaṁ na prāpnotīti  #
analyzed: na ca eva pibateḥ sani dvirvacana ibhyāsa hrasva tve ca kṛte bhūta pūrva gatyā dvi mātraḥ yam ākāraḥ iti ta para karaṇāt pipāsati iti atra ittva na prāpnoti iti

original: sāṁpratikābhābagrahaṇādve gaurityatra bhūtapūrvaiṅantādeṅhrasvātsaṁbuddheḥ iti saṁbuddhilopo na bhavati |

original: jñāpakaṁ cātrāco yat ityajgrahaṇaṁ taddhi halantāṭṭahalorṇyat iti ṇyataṁ vakṣyatīti pāriśeṣyādajantādeva yati siddhe dhitsyaṁ ditsyamityatrārddhadhātuka  #

asat etat

original: vā'sarūpavidhinā sopapado bhaviṣyati evaṁ tarhi kkibaṇośca śāstrakṛt śāstrakāra ityatra vā'sarūpavidherabhāvāt samāveśo na syāt |

iti śrī sīradeva kṛtāyā paribhāṣā vṛttau pratyaya pādaḥ

original: īṅo ṇici krīṅjīnāṁ ṇau ityāttve pukri ca kṛte āprūpe sampanne lyapi parato vibhāṣāpa ityanenāyādeśo na bhavati |

original: uṣā caratītyatrārthe carati iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt ṭhaki kṛte usśabdasya lākṣaṇikatvādisusuktāntāt kaḥ iti ko na bhavati |

auṣikam iti
pratipada ukta us pratyaya antāt bhavati

original: nanvevaṁ sati hvāvāmaśca ityatra māgrahaṇena meṅo grahaṇaṁ na syāt | na |

original: na caivaṁ mā māna ityasyāpi grahanamiti vācyam |

original: yattu ghumāsthāgādi sūtre nyāsakāreṇa lugvikaraṇaparibhāṣāyā api bādha uktaḥ |
analyzed: yat tu sūtre nyāsa kāreṇa luk vikaraṇa paribhāṣāyāḥ api bādhaḥ uktaḥ

original: yattu hvāvāmaśca ityatra maitreyeṇoktaṁ yeṣāṁ darśanaṁ gāmādāgrahaṇeṣvaviśeṣa iti lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣābādhanārthamidaṁ niranubandhakaparibhāṣābādhanārthamidaṁ  #
analyzed: yat tu iti atra maitreyeṇa ukta yeṣām darśana gāmāda grahaṇeṣu aviśeṣaḥ iti lakṣaṇa pratipada ukta paribhāṣā bādhana artham idam niranubandhaka paribhāṣā bādhana artham idam

original: vā teṣāṁ mā māna ityasya lumvikaraṇatvād grahanaṁ veditavyam |
analyzed: vā teṣām ityasya lum vikaraṇa tvāt veditavyam

original: evaṁ hi sānubandhakatvānmāṅmeṅoreva grahaṇaṁ na syāt |

original: anyathā vyākhyāne tvasterbhū iti śtipā nirddeśo vaicitryārtha iti yaduktaṁ tadasaṁgataṁ syāt |
analyzed: anyathā vyākhyāne tu asteḥ bhū iti śtipā nirddeśaḥ vaicitrya arthaḥ iti yat ukta tat asagata syāt

original: asati śtipā nirddeśe lugvikaranaparibhāṣayā asukṣepaṇa ityasyaiva grahaṇaprasaṅgāt |
analyzed: asati śtipā nirddeśe luk vikarana paribhāṣayā asu kṣepaṇaḥ iti asya eva grahaṇa prasaṅgāt
atha niranubandhaka paribhāṣāyāḥ pratyaya viṣaya tvāt iha dhātu grahaṇe tad vyāpāra abhāvaḥ

original: yathā na kavateryaṅi ityatra vyākhyātaṁ nyāsakṛtā |

original: tadasaṅgataṁ yato niranubandhakaparibhāṣābādhe lākṣaṇikatvānmeṅo grahaṇaṁ na syāt |

ucyate

original: idaṁ keṣāṁ ciddarśanaṁ lakṣaṇaparibhāṣā bādhyate keṣāṁ cidubhayaparibhāṣā na tu lugvikaranaparibhāṣāpīti yāvat |

original: nāyaṁ vāśabdaḥ pakṣāntare kiṁ tarhi samuccaye |

original: yathā saṁgrahaśabdasya vyutpattau nyāsakṛtoktaṁ samyak samantādveti |

original: khaṇḍaśo vyutpannaṁ hi lākṣaṇikamiti na sarvasaṁmatam |
analyzed: khaṇḍaśas hi lākṣaṇikam iti na sarva samatam

original: tena vibhāṣā diksamāse bahuvrīhau ityatra sarvanāmavidhau pratipadoktasya diṅgāmānyantarāla iti bahuvrīhergrahaṇaṁ dakṣiṇapūrvasyai dehīti
analyzed: tena vibhāṣā diś samāse bahuvrīhau iti atra sarvanāma vidhau pratipada uktasya diṅ gāmāni antarāle iti bahuvrīheḥ grahaṇa dakṣiṇa pūrvasyai dehi iti
na tu anekam anya padārthaḥ iti atrasya

original: tathā ca ṝta iddhātoḥ ityatra ṝvarṇagrahaṇepīyamuktā |
analyzed: tathā ca ṝ taḥ i t dhātoḥ iti atra ṝ varṇa grahaṇe ipi iyam uktā

original: jñāpakaṁ cātra karttari bhuvaḥ khiṣṇuc khukañau ityatra khiṣṇuca ikārāditvam |
analyzed: jñāpaka ca atra karttari bhuvaḥ khiṣṇuc khukañau iti atra khiṣṇucaḥ ikāra ādi tvam

udātta tvāt bhuvaḥ sidvam ikāra ādi tvam iṣṇucaḥ

anityā ca iyam paribhāṣā

original: tena dādhāghvadāp ityatra ghāgrahaṇena dheṭo'pi grahaṇaṁ bhavati |

analyzed: etat tu apit iti karttavyā idāp iti yat tat lakṣaṇa paribhāṣāyāḥ abhāve hetuḥ iti tatas eva siddham

original: tathā kariṣīṣṭetyatra syasicsīyuṭ iti soyuḍgrahaṇena sīmātrasya grahaṇam |
analyzed: tathā kariṣīṣṭa iti atra iti soyuṭ grahaṇena sī mātrasya grahaṇam

original: tathāhi karṇacchede'pi śvā śvaiva nāśvo nāpi garddabha iti |

original: na vyo liṭi ityatra nisamupavibhyo hvaḥ ityatra caikārāntāyā eva prakṛterupādānam |

original: sarvādīni sarvanāmānīti sarvasyāpi saṁjñā siddhyati sarvasmāyiti |

original: tasau matvarthe ityatra tūdaśvittvānityacopalakṣye matvarthe matupo'ntarbhāvāttaddvāreṇaiva matupi saṁjñākāryaṁ siddham |

original: taduktaṁ siddhaṁ gadguṇāguṇābhyāṁ pāṇineryathā loka iti |

yathā lambakaram ānaya

original: jñāpakaṁ cātra tṛjbādhanārthaṁ nindahiṁsādi sūtra vuño vidhānam |

original: tat kurvan jñāpayati kva cidasti samāveśa iti kamrā kamanā yavatiriti rayucoḥ samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ |

original: na saṁprasāraṇe saṁprasāraṇam ityatra saṁprasāraṇagrahaṇānuvṛttau yat saṁprasāraṇagrahaṇaṁ tatsāmarthyāduttarasyāpi śvayuvamaghonāmataddhita  #

original: īhā ceṣṭetyatrākāralope kṛte yadyapyekādeśa udāttenodātta ityudāttatvaṁ nāsti tathāpyanudāttasya ca yatrodāttalopa ityanenodāttatvaṁ vidyata  #

original: ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ityataḥ pūrvagrahaṇānuvṛtyā'ntādivacca ityanenaikādeśaḥ pūrvasya kāryaṁ pratyantavat parasya kāryaṁ pratyādivatkriyate tatra  #

original: yathā śakyeta vidhiḥ karttumiti pūrvasyāntavattvenāmū ityatrādaso'serdādu do ma iti bhavati tathā parasyādivattvenāgnī vṛkṣāvityatra pragṛhyatve  #
